name: Caleb Carnett
title: Why MVC is so important
content: Itâ€™s just a three layer architecture where M stands for MODEL, V stands for VIEW, and the most important part in this architecture is CONTROLLER, like a Hero of any film. Thus, every layer in MVC is assigned with a unique responsibility.

name: Jane carnett
title: Object-Relational Mapping
content: I have really loved learning about ORMs. It's really simplified the way I create queries in SQL!
